name: Inner Sanctum
description:
Inner Sanctum is my submission to Studio Blue's RPG Maker MZ game jam.  It is a Christian-themed horror/mystery game. 

The story revolves around a young girl named "Meadow" who experienced tragedy when she woke up in a crime scene with her dead parents beside her. A group of religious individuals from the Divine Grace Monastery have offered to adopt the poor girl. After being welcomed with loving arms, things took a darker and twisted turn as the moon took over the night sky.

- Multiple Endings (4 in total)

- Immersive Atmospheric Horror

- Make intense choices that decide the fate of your character.
